original: Majjhima Nikāya 113
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Sappurisasutta
analyzed: sappurisa sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “sappurisadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asappurisadhammañca.
analyzed: sappurisa dhammañca vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi a sappurisa dhammañca

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave asappurisa dhammaḥ

original: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso uccākulā pabbajito hoti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave asappurisaḥ uccākulā pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi uccākulā pabbajito, ime panaññe bhikkhū na uccākulā pabbajitā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi uccākulā pabbajitaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na uccākulā pabbajitā ti

original: So tāya uccākulīnatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya ucca akulīna tāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho uccākulīnatāya lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho ucca akulīna tāya lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi uccākulā pabbajito hoti;
analyzed: no ce ipi uccākulā pabbajito hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uccākulīnatāya nevattānukkaṁseti na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tāya ucca akulīna tāya na param vambheti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso mahākulā pabbajito hoti …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ mahā kulā pabbajitaḥ hoti pe

original: mahābhogakulā pabbajito hoti …pe…
analyzed: mahābhogakulā pabbajitaḥ hoti pe

original: uḷārabhogakulā pabbajito hoti.
analyzed: uḷāra bhoga kulā pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi uḷārabhogakulā pabbajito, ime panaññe bhikkhū na uḷārabhogakulā pabbajitā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi uḷāra bhoga kulā pabbajitaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na uḷāra bhoga kulā pabbajitā ti

original: So tāya uḷārabhogatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya uḷāra bhoga tāya attā anukkasā iti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho uḷārabhogatāya lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho uḷāra bhoga tāya lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi uḷārabhogakulā pabbajito hoti;
analyzed: no ce ipi uḷāra bhoga kulā pabbajitaḥ hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uḷārabhogatāya nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tāya uḷāra bhoga tāya na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso ñāto hoti yasassī.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ ñātaḥ hoti yasassī

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ñāto yasassī, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi ñātaḥ yasassī ime pana aññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā ati

original: So tena ñattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena ñattena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho ñattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho ñattena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi ñāto hoti yasassī;
analyzed: no ce pi ñātaḥ hoti yasassī

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ñattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena ñattena na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso lābhī hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ lābhī hoti cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārāna

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ, ime panaññe bhikkhū na lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi lābhī cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārāna ime pana aññe bhikkhū na lābhinaḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārānanti

original: So tena lābhena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena lābhena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho lābhena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho lābhena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi lābhī hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ;
analyzed: no ce pi lābhī hoti cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārāna

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena lābhena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena lābhena na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso bahussuto hoti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ bahu sutaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi bahussuto, ime panaññe bhikkhū na bahussutā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi bahussutaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na bahussutā ti

original: So tena bāhusaccena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena bāhusaccena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho bāhusaccena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho bāhusaccena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi bahussuto hoti;
analyzed: no ce ipi bahu sutaḥ hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena bāhusaccena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena bāhusaccena na ivattā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vinayadharo hoti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ vinaya dharaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi vinayadharo, ime panaññe bhikkhū na vinayadharā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi vinaya dharaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na vinaya dharā ti

original: So tena vinayadharattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho vinayadharattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho vinaya dharattena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi vinayadharo hoti;
analyzed: no ced ipi vinaya dharaḥ

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena vinayadharattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena vinaya dharattena na param vambheti

analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso dhammakathiko hoti.

analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: So tena dhammakathikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: so tena dhamma kathika ttena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: No cepi piṇḍapātiko hoti;
analyzed: no ce ipi piṇḍapātikaḥ hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena piṇḍapātikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena piṇḍapātikattena na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso rukkhamūliko hoti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ rukkhamūlikaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi rukkhamūliko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na rukkhamūlikā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi rukkhamūlikaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na rukkhamūlikā ti

original: So tena rukkhamūlikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena rukkhamūlika ttena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho rukkhamūlikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho rukkhamūlika ttena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi rukkhamūliko hoti;
analyzed: no ce ipi rukkhamūlikaḥ hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena rukkhamūlikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena rukkhamūlika ttena na iva attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sosāniko hoti …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ sosānikaḥ hoti pe

original: abbhokāsiko hoti …
analyzed: abbhokāsikaḥ hoti

original: nesajjiko hoti …pe…
analyzed: nesajjikaḥ hoti pe

original: yathāsanthatiko hoti …pe…
analyzed: yathā santhatikaḥ hoti pe

original: ekāsaniko hoti.
analyzed: eka āsanikaḥ hoti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ekāsaniko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na ekāsanikā’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi ekāsanikaḥ ime pana aññe bhikkhū na ekāsanikā ati

original: So tena ekāsanikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tena eka asani kattena attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho ekāsanikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: na kho eka āsanika ttena lobha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti dosa dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti moha dhammāḥ vā parikkhayam gacchanti

original: No cepi ekāsaniko hoti;
analyzed: na u ced ipi eka āsanikaḥ hoti

original: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
analyzed: so ca hoti dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipanno sāmīci ppaṭipannaḥ anudhamma cārī so tattha pujjo so tattha pāsaso ti

original: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ekāsanikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipadayā iva antaram karitvā tena eka āsanikattena na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi paṭhamajjhāna samāpattiyā lābhī ime pana aññe bhikkhū paṭhamajjhāna samāpattiyā na lābhino ti

original: So tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya paṭhamajjhāna samāpattiyā attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāya paṭhamajjhāna samāpattiyāḥ na iva attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:

analyzed: aham khomhi catuttha jhāna samāpattiyā lābhī ime pana aññe bhikkhū catuttha jhāna samāpattiyā na lābhino ti

original: So tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya catuttha jjhāna samāpattiyā attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘catutthajjhānasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: catuttha jhāna samāpattiyā api kho atammaya tā vuttā bhagavatā

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāya catuttha jhāna samāpattiyāḥ na iva attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi ākāsa ānañcāyatana samāpattiyā lābhī ime pana aññe bhikkhū ākāsa ānañcāyatana samāpattiyā na lābhino ti

original: So tāya ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāyai ākāsa anañcāyatana samāpattiyai attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāyai ākāsa anañca āyatana samāpattiyāḥ na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ sabbaso ākāsānañca āyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:

original: So tāya viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: so tāya viññāṇañcāyatana samāpattiyā attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatana samāpattiyā api kho atammaya tā vuttā bhagavatā

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāya viññāṇaṃ ca āyatana samāpattiyā na iva attā anukkaseti na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.

original: So tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya ākiñcaññāyatana samāpattiyāḥ attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana samāpattiyā api kho atammaya tā vuttā bhagavatā

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāya ākiñcaññāyatana samāpattiyāḥ na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave asappurisaḥ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘ahaṁ khomhi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
analyzed: aham khomhi neva saññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattiyāḥ lābhī ime pana aññe bhikkhū neva saññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattiyāḥ na lābhino ti

original: So tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā attā anukkaseti param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave asappurisa dhammo

original: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāpi kho atammayatā vuttā bhagavatā.
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattiyā api kho atammaya tā vuttā bhagavatā

original: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññanti tatas tam hoti aññathā ati

original: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
analyzed: saḥ antaram karitvā tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā na param vambheti

original: Ayampi, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo.
analyzed: ayam pi bhikkhave sappurisa dhammo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sappuriso sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati. Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave sappurisaḥ sabbasas nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇāḥ honti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na kiñci maññati, na kuhiñci maññati, na kenaci maññatī”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhave bhikkhu na kiñci maññati na kuhiñci maññati na kenaci maññati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Sappurisasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: sappurisa suttam niṭṭhitam tatiya
